name: autoresearch.next

patterns.pattern: ^You search and search but can't find that information.$
^You can't learn about that in books. Go find a teacher.$
^You can't learn any more about that from books!$
^You can't learn smuggling skills from a book!$
^You aren't going to learn that from a book. Go find a Wookiee!$
^You can't learn bounty hunting skills from a book!$
^Go learn it the hard way, sissy.$
^You're not going to learn force spells from a book. Trust me.$
^You cannot learn more about that from books.$

script: if lotj.autoResearch.enabled then echo("\n"); expandAlias("autoresearch next", false) end

name: autoresearch.continue

patterns.pattern: ^You finish your studies and feel much more skilled.$
^You study for hours on end, but fail to gather any knowledge.$

script: if lotj.autoResearch.enabled then echo("\n"); expandAlias("autoresearch continue", false) end

name: autoresearch.interrupted

patterns.pattern: ^You are interrupted and fail to finish your studies...$

script: if lotj.autoResearch.enabled then lotj.autoResearch.log("Type 'autoresearch continue' to pick up where you left off.", true) end

patterns.pattern: ^To see a shorter practice list, type PRACTICE <class name>.$
